channel.title: Albany County|Wyoming|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Albany County|Wyoming|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 290
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 290 - Quealy Dome Road.

item.title: BL-80 East - Laramie
item.description: BL-80 East on Curtis St. in Laramie

item.title: I-80 West Exits 311/Exit 310
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 311 - WY-130/WY-230/Snowy Range Road. Approaching Exit 310 - Curtis St.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 313 Offramp at US-287
item.description: I-80 West Exit 313 Offramp at US-287 in Laramie. Turn right for US-287 North/3rd St. Turn left for US-287 South/Fort Collins (Colorado)/Port of Entry.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 313 Offramp at US-287
item.description: I-80 West Exit 313 Offramp at US-287 in Laramie.

item.title: WY-34 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on WY-34 east. Distance to I-25 and Wheatland (via I-25).

item.title: I-80 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-80 east. Distance to Cheyenne and Pine Bluffs. Pine Bluffs is on the border with Nebraska.

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 311 and 313
item.description: I-80 East at Exit 311 - WY-130/WY-230/Snowy Range Road. Approaching Exit 313 - US-287/3rd St./Fort Collins (Colorado).

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 310 and 311
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 310 - BL-80/Curtis St. Approaching Exit 311 - WY-130/WY-230/Snowy Range Road.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 310
item.description: I-80 East approaching Exit 310 - BL-80/Curtis St. This is the western end of the Laramie business loop. The BL-80 shield is incorrectly displayed as an interstate shield.

item.title: US-30 West/US-287 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-30 West/US-287 North. Distance to Medicine Bow and Rawlins.

item.title: US-30 West/US-287 North approaching WY-13
item.description: US-30 West/US-287 North approaching WY-13 in Rock River.

item.title: US-30 West/US-287 North - Return To Laramie When Flashing
item.description: US-30 West/US-287 North - Road Closed, Return To Laramie When Flashing

item.title: US-30 West/US-287 North At WY-34
item.description: US-30 West/US-287 North at WY-34 north to Wheatland. Continue on US-30 West/US-287 North to Rawlins.

item.title: US-30 West/US-287 North Approaching WY-34
item.description: US-30 West/US-287 North at WY-34 North in Albany County.

item.title: BL-80/US-30 West/US-287 North - Laramie
item.description: BL-80/US-30 West/US-287 North (3rd St.) at BL-80 West (Curtis St.). Turn left to continue on BL-80 West/To I-80.

item.title: BL-80/US-30 West at US-287
item.description: BL-80/US-30 West (Grand Ave.) at US-287 (S 3rd St) in Laramie. Turn left for US-287 South; turn right for BL-80/US-30 West/US-287 North. US-287 north joins US-30 west to Rawlins.

item.title: BL-80/US-30 West Approaching US-287
item.description: BL-80/US-30 West (Grand Ave) approaching US-287 (S 3rd St.) in Laramie.

item.title: BL-80/US-30 West - Laramie
item.description: Entering Laramie on BL-80/US-30 West. Population 30816. Elevation 7165 Feet. Laramie is the third largest city in Wyoming and the home to the University of Wyoming.

item.title: End WY-210 West at I-80/US-30
item.description: End WY-210 West (Happy Jack Road) at I-80/US-30. Use I-80/US-30 West for Laramie; I-80/US-30 East for Cheyenne.

item.title: WY-210 West Approaching I-80/US-30
item.description: WY-210 West (Happy Jack Road) approaching I-80/US-30.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 316
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 316 - BL-80/US-30 West/Grand Ave. This is the eastern end of the Laramie business loop. US-30 leaves I-80 westbound here and rejoins I-80 at Walcott Junction.

item.title: I-80 West - Elevation 8640
item.description: I-80 west - Elevation 8640. This is the highest point on all of I-80. The summit lies between Cheyenne and Laramie in the Sherman Mountains.

item.title: US-30 West/US-287 North approaching WY-13
item.description: US-30 West/US-287 North approaching WY-13 in Rock River.

item.title: US-30 West/US-287 North At WY-34
item.description: US-30 West/US-287 North at WY-34 north to Wheatland. Continue on US-30 West/US-287 North to Rawlins.

item.title: US-30 West/US-287 North Approaching WY-34
item.description: US-30 West/US-287 North at WY-34 North in Albany County.

item.title: US-287 North at I-80 West
item.description: US-287 north at I-80 west to Rawlins. Continue straight for US-287 North/3rd St.

item.title: US-287 North At I-80 East
item.description: US-287 north at I-80 East to Cheyenne. I-80 West to Rawlins, next right. Continue straight for US-287 North/3rd St.

item.title: US-287 North at I-80
item.description: US-287 north approaching I-80.

item.title: US-287 North Approaching I-80
item.description: US-287 North approaching I-80. Continue straight on US-287 for downtown Laramie. Take the second right for I-80 East to Cheyenne.

item.title: US-287 North Approaching I-80
item.description: US-287 north approaching I-80.

item.title: US-287 North - Entering Laramie
item.description: Entering Laramie on US-287 north. Pop: 27,204 - Elev - 7,167.

item.title: I-80 West Exit 290
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 290, Quealy Dome Road, 1/4 mile.

item.title: I-80 Onramp Exit 310 - Curtis St.
item.description: BL-80 West at I-80 in Laramie. Turn right for I-80 west to Rawlins; proceed over freeway for I-80 east to Cheyenne.

item.title: End WY-130/WY-230 at Curtis St.

item.description: I-80 west at Exit 311, WY-130/WY-230/Snowy Range Road, and approaching Exit 310, Curtis St., 1 1/4 miles.

item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 311, WY-130/WY-230/Snowy Range Road, 1 1/4 mile.

item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 313, US-287/3rd St./Fort Collins, Colo., 1 mile.

item.title: I-80 West Exit 316
item.description: I-80 west to Rawlins at Exit 316, BL-80/US-30 West/Grand Ave.

item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 323, WY-210/Happy Jack Road, 1 mile.

item.description: I-80 west at Exit 329, Vedauwoo Road.
